scripts.build: npm run build:widget && npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:widget: cd apps/widget && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:dashboard: cd apps/dashboard && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p apps/dashboard/dist/widget && cp apps/widget/dist/widget.js apps/dashboard/dist/widget.js && cp apps/widget/dist/style.css apps/dashboard/dist/style.css
